title: Blood Bond
description: Kalina and her vampire suitors have uncovered one of the greatest finds in vampire history that can change the existence of vampires. This is the highly-anticipated fifth book in the popular bestselling and award-winning PULSE vampire series. PULSE, was the Award-Winning Finalist in two categories - "Fiction: Romance" and "Fiction: Multicultural" of the 2011 International Book Awards, where Kailin Gow won first place overall in Fiction Horror, joining winners from St. Martin's Press, Simon & Shuster, Zondervan, and Random House. She joins other winners such as Desmond Tutu and Rick Warren in the 2011 International Book Awards. author: Kailin Gow
